body:
Comment 1: 
Strange. It runs on FreeBSD 8.0-RELEASE-p4. And those are odd errors.

What version of gcc are you running? I have:

$ gcc -v
Using built-in specs.
Target: amd64-undermydesk-freebsd
Configured with: FreeBSD/amd64 system compiler
Thread model: posix
gcc version 4.2.1 20070719  [FreeBSD]
_Labels changed: added **os-freebsd**._
